recipes.title: Spicy Beef & Sweet Potatoes, Pan-Seared
recipes.description: A drink-friendly Mexican dish featuring beef and sweet potatoes with a spicy twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and sliced aromatics.
Pan-Seared the beef with salt, pepper, and spicy profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the sweet potatoes separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine beef, vegetables, and sweet potatoes; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
recipes.author: Auto-generated dataset

steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and grated aromatics.
Air-Fried the paneer with salt, pepper, and lemon profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the rice separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine paneer, vegetables, and rice; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
